sourceDesc.p: Archived manuscript pages of "To the Lighthouse" from Woolf Online.

projectDesc.p: TEI encoding of selected manuscript pages from Virginia Woolf's "To the Lighthouse", as archived by Woolf Online.

figure.head: Manuscript Page 1 of "To the Lighthouse"

graphic.url: Manuscript Page 1 of To the Lighthouse.jpg

figure.figDesc: This manuscript page represents an early draft of "To the Lighthouse". It reveals Woolf's concern with sentence rhythm and pacing. The original image is available at .

figure.head: Manuscript Page 2 of "To the Lighthouse"

graphic.url: Manuscript Page 2 of To the Lighthouse.jpg

figure.figDesc: This page continues the narrative development from the previous manuscript leaf. It highlights Woolf's process of refining sentence structure and narrative flow. The original image is available at
